forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow along with gusty winds at times, especially this morning. High 3C. WSW winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 20-30cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow. Winds will be gusty at times this morning. High 39F. WSW winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low -4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Low 28F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will transition to snow showers during the afternoon. High 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will transition to snow showers during the afternoon. High 37F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low around -10C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 15F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 3C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High around 40F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low -6C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 24F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 8C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 49F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -4C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 26F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 50F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 27F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 53F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Snow showers overnight. Low 36F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow flurries and snow showers. Low -3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers or flurries. Low 28F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low near -5C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 24F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.
